DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the year of the end of hormonal therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level. The treatment may include administration of hormones or hormone analogs to the patient, or decreasing the level of hormones in the body by using hormone antagonists, or hormone ablation therapy. The concept covers but not limited to: intermittent or permanent hormone suppression or ablation in treatment of hormone-dependent tumors, hormone replacement therapy of any kind, hormonal component of gender reassignment therapy, hormonal contraception, surgical and radiation castration._The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.:The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level. The treatment may include administration of hormones or hormone analogs to the patient, or decreasing the level of hormones in the body by using hormone antagonists, or hormone ablation therapy. The concept covers but not limited to: intermittent or permanent hormone suppression or ablation in treatment of hormone-dependent tumors, hormone replacement therapy of any kind, hormonal component of gender reassignment therapy, hormonal contraception, surgical and radiation castration.

Concepts.definition: Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level.

Property.preferredDefinition: The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.:The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened.

Concepts.definition: The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: Something that happens at a given place and time.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

DataElement.changeDescription: Reviewed and approved for Release by TCGA team on 1/8/2010
